title: Black screen after clicking launch
body:
When i click launch, i can hear the music but i only see black screen , cant past my nickname and password
I asked for help 2 moth ago but still got no help
i had reinstaled the game still dont work

replies.body: Hmmmmm your client might be having a hard time figuring out what splash screen it's supposed to display because it can't grab the info from our servers. Let's check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick, but if that doesn't work hit me back and we can take another look!

I dont understand why it was ok with old client and with new client is going wrong. 
And solving connection issues didnt help

A lot of the files changed with the new client, so some of your settings may not apply anymore. Since those steps weren't able to help much, let's get you in touch with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they'll be able to look much closer.
